columns.name: time_of_day
columns.description: Time of day when the interaction occurred (e.g., Morning, Afternoon, Evening, Night)

columns.name: device
columns.description: Device used for the interaction (e.g., Mobile, Desktop, Tablet)

columns.name: location
columns.description: City where the interaction took place

columns.name: interaction_type
columns.description: Type of interaction (e.g., view, add_to_cart, purchase)

columns.name: timestamp
columns.description: Date and time of the interaction (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user who wrote review

columns.name: product_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the reviewed product
